"Special Mission: Rappy Fever":
"Outside the ARKS Ship, we have
discovered a spatio-temporal distortion.
Our sensors detect rare enemy reactions
coming from within the distortion.

ARKS who are battle-ready are asked
to go and investigate the situation.
――――――――――――――――――――
Start: Use Bonus Key Rappy F
Clear: Defeat enemies before time is up."
